games.title: Squid Game (Red Light, Green Light)
games.description: Official Squid Game Red Light, Green Light challenge. Move during green light, freeze during red light, or face elimination!
games.author: Aritra

games.title: Chor Police Dakat Babu
games.description: Traditional Indian chase game! Play as police catching thieves or as a thief trying to escape. Strategic gameplay with multiple roles.
games.author: Aritra

games.title: FPS Shooter Game
games.description: First-person shooter with realistic graphics and smooth controls. Take down enemies and complete missions in this intense FPS experience.
games.author: Tamonash

games.title: Dino 3D Game
games.description: Enhanced 3D version of the classic Chrome Dino game! Jump over obstacles and survive as long as possible in this endless runner.
games.author: Ayan Das

games.description: Join numbers to reach the 2048 tile in this addictive puzzle game. Slide tiles and combine matching numbers strategically.
games.author: Gabriele Cirulli

games.title: Tetris
games.description: The legendary block-stacking puzzle game! Arrange falling blocks to clear lines and achieve high scores.
games.author: Tetris Company
